articles.title: Nearly 50% of those who contracted COVID-19 in Africa are suffering from long Covid: Study - WION
articles.description: Nearly 50% of those who contracted COVID-19 in Africa are suffering from long Covid: Study
articles.content: Almost half of the people known to have contracted COVID-19 in Africa are now living with the effects of long Covid, according to a recent analysis published in Scientific Reports. The research condu… [+2788 chars]
